name: vscode-msr
displayName: Code mining + Replace file + Find definition and reference for all types.
description: Code mining + Replace file + Find definition and reference in multiple repository paths by msr for all coding languages + configuration + doc files.
author: qualiu@microsoft.com

commands.title: Regex find definition in current file.
Regex find references in current file.
Regex find all references in small files.
Regex find all references in source files.
Regex find all references in same type files.
Regex find all references in code + config.
Regex find as general definition roughly.
Regex find all references in code files.
Regex find all pure references in code files.
Regex find all pure references in source files.
Regex find all references in doc files.
Regex find all references in config files.
Find `selected plain text` in code files.
Find `selected plain text` in code + config.
Find `selected plain text` in config files.
Find `selected plain text` in doc files.
Find `selected plain text` in code + config + doc.
Find `selected plain text` in small files.
Sort source files by size.
Sort source files by write time.
Sort all files by size.
Sort all files by write time.
Sort code files by size.
Sort code files by write time.
Cook general alias to 1 file.
Cook project specific alias to 1 file.
Cook scripts: General alias.
Cook scripts: Project specific alias.
Cook general + Dump other alias to scripts.
Cook project + Dump other alias to scripts.
Temp enable/disable find-definition.
Find top file folder distribution.
Find top file type distribution.
Find top source file type distribution.
Find top source file folder distribution.
Find top code file type distribution.
Find top code file folder distribution.
Compare file lists if used .gitignore.

msr.menu.visible.description: If false, will hide all `msr` context menus (menu by right-click to prompt) of `Regex find xxx` or `Find plain text`.

msr.clearTerminalBeforeExecutingCommands.description: Clear terminal/console before executing new commands.

msr.autoMergeSkipFolders.description: Auto merge excluded folders from each project's root folder `.vscode/settings.json` file's `search.exclude` + `files.exclude`.

msr.initProjectCmdAliasForNewTerminals.description: Initialize command shortcuts (alias/doskeys) for newly created/opened terminals with a temp file cooked by project settings. (You can type `exit` to back to PowerShell console on Windows)

msr.skipInitCmdAliasForNewTerminalTitleR.description: Regex pattern of terminal title to skip initializing command shortcuts for newly opened terminals.

msr.changePowerShellTerminalToCmdOrBash.description: Value = [auto | false | true]: Change PowerShell to CMD/Bash terminal when adding/initializing new terminals. For `auto`: treat as `false` if got git-exemptions

msr.overwriteProjectCmdAliasForNewTermin.description: Overwrite the default initialized command shortcuts (alias/doskeys) of a project when open a new terminal.

msr.overwriteInconsistentCommonAliasByEx.description: Overwrite inconsistent common alias by vscode-msr.

msr.findTopFolder.menu.visible.description: Show menu: Find top file folder distribution.

msr.findTopType.menu.visible.description: Show menu: Find top file type distribution.

msr.findTopSourceFolder.menu.visible.description: Show menu: Find top source file folder distribution.

msr.findTopSourceType.menu.visible.description: Show menu: Find top source file type distribution.

msr.findTopCodeFolder.menu.visible.description: Show menu: Find top code file folder distribution.

msr.findTopCodeType.menu.visible.description: Show menu: Find top code file type distribution.

msr.cookCmdAlias.menu.visible.description: Cook 1 file of general command alias/doskey (like 'find-def', 'find-doc') to help fast search in/out vscode.

msr.cookCmdAliasByProject.menu.visible.description: Cook 1 file of command alias/doskey by settings of default + overwritten-by-project to help fast search in/out vscode.

msr.cookCmdAliasFiles.menu.visible.description: Cook scripts of general command alias/doskey (like 'find-def', 'find-doc') to help fast search in/out vscode.

msr.cookCmdAliasFilesByProject.menu.visi.description: Cook scripts of command alias/doskey by settings of default + overwritten-by-project to help fast search in/out vscode.

msr.cookCmdAliasDumpWithOthersToFiles.me.description: Cook general shortcuts + Dump with other command alias/doskeys to script files to be used in other scripts or commands.

msr.cookCmdAliasDumpWithOthersToFilesByP.description: Cook shortcuts by project settings + Dump with other command alias/doskeys to script files to be used in other scripts or commands.

msr.default.sortResults.description: Sort matched results of definitions or references.

msr.default.removeLowScoreResultsFactor.description: Remove low score definition search results (if enabled sortResults) which score lower than average plus this factor. To disable this: set a large value like 10. Overwrite with `msr.{root-folder-name}.removeLowScoreResultsFactor`.

msr.default.keepHighScoreResultCount.description: Keep high score result count. Default -1 means keep all results. Overwrite with `msr.{root-folder-name}.keepHighScoreResultCount`.

msr.disable.projectRootFolderNamePattern.description: Regex pattern of project root folder names to disable finding definition and references.

msr.disable.extensionPattern.description: Regex pattern of file extensions to disable finding definition and references. Example: tsx?|jsx?|vue|py|java|cpp

msr.disable.findDef.extensionPattern.description: Regex pattern of file extensions to disable finding definition. Example: tsx?|jsx?|vue|py|java|cpp

msr.disable.findRef.extensionPattern.description: Regex pattern of file extensions to disable finding reference. Example: tsx?|jsx?|vue|py|java|cpp (Please reload vscode if removed `.*`)

msr.findingCommands.useExtraPaths.description: Use extra paths for finding commands in context menu or command palette.

msr.findReference.useExtraPaths.description: Use extra paths for finding references.

msr.findDefinition.useExtraPaths.description: Use extra paths for finding definition.

msr.enable.onlyFindDefinitionForKnownLan.description: Only enable finding definition and reference for known language type: exist `msr.fileExtensionMap.{name}` or `msr.{name}.definition`

msr.enable.useGeneralFindingWhenNoResult.description: Start general finding commands if not found matched results of `definition` or `reference` etc.

msr.default.maxSearchDepth.description: Maximum search depth (start from input path as depth = 1), will be overwritten if search commands has set `-k {n}`.

msr.default.promoteFolderScore.description: Default promotion score for matched folders.

msr.default.promotePathScore.description: Default promotion score for matched paths.

msr.default.demoteFolderScore.description: Default demotion score for matched folders.

msr.default.demotePathScore.description: Default demotion score for matched paths.

msr.definition.searchAllRootFolders.description: Find definition in all root folders of current vscode workspace (if have multiple root folders).

msr.reference.searchAllRootFolders.description: Find references in all root folders of current vscode workspace (if have multiple root folders).

msr.reference.autoChangeSearchWord.description: Auto change word variations when finding references for languages like C++ and Java Spring Boot.

msr.descendingSortForVSCode.description: Descending sort result for `Visual Studio Code`.

msr.descendingSortForConsoleOutput.description: Descending sort result for console output channel at bottom of `Visual Studio Code`.

msr.disableReRunSearch.description: Disable automatic re-running searches to avoid noise on terminals.

msr.reRunSearchInTerminalIfResultsMoreTh.description: Re-run search in a terminal if got results count more than that. Helpful if a known vscode bug is still not fixed: vscode cannot go to definition when already got results.

msr.reRunSearchInTerminalIfCostLessThan.description: Re-run search in a terminal if got multiple results and time cost seconds less than this. Will show colorful + clickable results.

msr.default.searchAllFilesForReferences.description: When finding references, search all file types (code + configuration + document) other than current file type(extension).

msr.default.searchAllFilesForDefinitions.description: When finding definition, search all file types (code + configuration + document) other than current file type(extension).

msr.default.extraSearchPaths.description: Default extra search paths. Use ';' to separate groups (`global-paths` or `root-folder-name=paths` pairs), use ',' to separate paths. You can also set `msr.{root-folder-name}.extraSearchPaths` in your personal settings file like `%APPDATA%\Code\User\settings.json` on Windows (See doc: https://github.com/qualiu/vscode-msr/blob/master/README.md#specific-extra-search-paths-settings)

msr.default.extraSearchPathListFiles.description: Default extra search path list files (one path at one line in each file). Use ';' to separate groups (`global-paths` or `root-folder-name=paths` pairs), use ',' to separate paths. (See doc: https://github.com/qualiu/vscode-msr/blob/master/README.md#specific-extra-search-paths-settings)

msr.default.skip.pureReference.description: Regex pattern to skip junk results like comments when finding references in code files.

msr.showInfo.description: Print extra info like command line.

msr.default.listSortingFilesOptions.description: Default list file options. Like listing top 10 and bottom 10 files: -l -H 10 -T 10

msr.debug.description: Print debug info of msr (for vscode-msr contributors).

msr.default.skipFolders.description: Default Regex pattern to skip folders. You can set each project's additional skip patterns: `msr.{root-folder-name}.definition.skipFolders` or `msr.{root-folder-name}.reference.skipFolders` in your personal settings file like `%APPDATA%\Code\User\settings.json` on Windows (See doc: https://github.com/qualiu/vscode-msr/blob/master/README.md#specific-extra-search-paths-settings).

msr.useGitIgnoreFile.description: Use top folder '.gitignore' file if exists in local git repository root folder.

msr.omitGitIgnoreExemptions.description: Use '.gitignore' file even if there're exemptions (like '!xxx') and omit them. Otherwise not use git-ignore.

msr.autoCompareFileListsIfUsedGitIgnore.description: Auto compare file lists if used '.gitignore' (enabled `msr.useGitIgnoreFile`) when opening a project folder.

msr.skipDotFoldersIfUseGitIgnoreFile.description: Skip dot/dollar folders like: .{folder-name} or '${folder-name}' when using '.gitignore' file.

msr.exportLongSkipGitPathsLength.description: Export to a temp variable Skip_Git_Paths (for --np like using '.gitignore') if length exceeds this value (avoid long git-ignore pattern).

msr.default.allFiles.description: Default Regex pattern for files to search.

msr.default.codeFileExtensionMappingType.description: Regex pattern of coding language types. For each value of this, the file extensions defined in `msr.fileExtensionMap.xxx` will be treated as code file type like: msr.default.codeFiles

msr.default.codeFiles.description: Default Regex pattern for all code files.

msr.default.codeFilesPlusUI.description: Default Regex pattern for all UI (front-end) code files.

msr.default.configFiles.description: Default Regex pattern for configuration files.

msr.default.docFiles.description: Default Regex pattern for document files.

msr.default.codeAndConfig.description: Default Regex pattern for code + configuration files.

msr.default.codeAndConfigDocs.description: Default Regex pattern for code + configuration + document files.

msr.default.configAndDocs.description: Default Regex pattern for configuration + document files.

msr.default.class.skip.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to filter non-definitions for class.

msr.default.method.skip.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to filter non-definitions for method.

msr.default.skip.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to filter non-definitions.

msr.default.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to find definitions of a word (class, method, etc.). Must use `%1` to be replaced by word to search.

msr.java.definition.description: Default Java Regex pattern to find definitions of a word (class, method, etc.). Must use `%1` to be replaced by word to search.

msr.default.reference.description: Default Regex pattern to find references of a word (class, method, etc.). Must use `%1` to be replaced by word to search.

msr.allSmallFiles.extraOptions.description: Default extra searching options for small files. Will merge `msr.{root-folder-name}.extraOptions` if you set in your personal settings file like `%APPDATA%\Code\User\settings.json` on Windows (See doc: https://github.com/qualiu/vscode-msr/blob/master/README.md#specific-extra-search-paths-settings).

msr.default.scriptFiles.description: Default Regex pattern for script files.

msr.batch.isLocalVariableResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is a local variable of batch script.

msr.sh.isLocalVariableResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is a local variable of shell script.

msr.ps.isLocalVariableResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is a local variable of PowerShell script.

msr.cmdAlias.saveFolder.description: Save folder for command shortcuts file when cooking. If not set, will use `%USERPROFILE%` (Windows) or `~/` (Linux) for single file, and `%USERPROFILE%\cmdAlias` or `~/cmdAlias/` for multiple script files.

msr.cookCmdAlias.hideWarningsAndExtraInf.description: When cooking command alias/doskey, add -I to hide warnings and extra info (overwrite default extraOption).

msr.cookCmdAlias.outputFullPath.description: When cooking command alias/doskeys, add -W to output full path (overwrite default extraOption).

msr.cookCmdAlias.outputFullPathForDumpin.description: When cooking command alias/doskey to script files, add -W to output full path (overwrite default extraOption).

msr.cookCmdAlias.outputRelativePathForLi.description: When cooking command alias/doskey, remove -W to output relative path for Linux terminals on Windows (overwrite default extraOption).

msr.cookCmdAlias.addEchoOff.description: Add '@echo off' or set empty when cooking each command alias/doskeys to a batch script file named alias.cmd

msr.cookCmdAlias.setVariablesToLocalScop.description: Add '@SetLocal EnableExtensions EnableDelayedExpansion' or set to empty when cooking each command alias/doskeys to a batch script file named alias.cmd

msr.cookCmdAlias.showLongTip.description: Show long tip guide for command alias in terminals.

msr.searchRelativePathForLinuxTerminalsO.description: Use relative path: Search '.' other than full project paths if it's on Windows with Linux terminals(MinGW/Cygwin) to avoid unable to click + open search results.

msr.searchRelativePathForNativeTerminals.description: Use relative path: Search '.' other than full project paths for native system terminals to output short paths.

msr.definition.extraOptions.description: Default extra searching options for finding definitions: Get top {N} results and jump out. Will merge `msr.{root-folder-name}.extraOptions` if you set in your personal settings file like `%APPDATA%\Code\User\settings.json` on Windows (See doc: https://github.com/qualiu/vscode-msr/blob/master/README.md#specific-extra-search-paths-settings).

msr.reference.extraOptions.description: Default extra searching options for finding references: Get top {N} results and jump out. Will merge `msr.{root-folder-name}.extraOptions` if you set in your personal settings file like `%APPDATA%\Code\User\settings.json` on Windows (See doc: https://github.com/qualiu/vscode-msr/blob/master/README.md#specific-extra-search-paths-settings).

msr.default.preferSearchingSpeedOverPrec.description: Prefer speed over precision when searching definition. Try to unset it for small projects if found wrong results.

msr.default.isClassResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is a class.

msr.go.isClassResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is a GoLang class.

msr.java.isClassResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is a Java class.

msr.default.isConstantResult.description: Regex to check if a result is a constant.

msr.default.isEnumResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is an enum.

msr.default.isInterfaceResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is an interface.

msr.default.isMethodResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is an method/function.

msr.default.isFindMemberOrLocalVariable.description: Default Regex to check if what-to-find is a member or local variable.

msr.default.isMemberResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is a member.

msr.java.isMemberResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is a Java member.

msr.default.isLocalVariableResult.description: Regex pattern to check if result is a local variable.

msr.default.isFindClass.description: Default Regex pattern to check if what-to-find is a `class`.

msr.default.isFindClassByWordCheck.description: Default Regex pattern to check the class name %1 which is usually a capitalized word. If set to empty will skip checking.

msr.default.isFindClassOrEnum.description: Default Regex pattern to check if what-to-find is a `class` or `enum`.

msr.default.isFindMethod.description: Default Regex pattern to check if what-to-find is a `method`.

msr.default.isFindClassOrMethod.description: Default Regex to check if what-to-find is a `class` or `method`.

msr.default.isFindMember.description: Default Regex to check if what-to-find is a class `member`.

msr.default.isFindEnum.description: Default Regex to check if what-to-find is an `enum`.

msr.searchDefinition.timeoutSeconds.description: Default timeout seconds to wait for searching definition.

msr.autoRunSearchDefinition.timeoutSecon.description: Default timeout seconds to wait for auto-triggered searching definition in terminal when no results or multiple results found.

msr.default.isFindConstant.description: Default Regex pattern to check if `current word` is a constant.

msr.useDefaultFindingClass.extensions.description: When finding class/method definitions from script/doc files, skip self defined patterns for these languages/extensions.

msr.default.class.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to search class definitions.

msr.default.member.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to search member definitions.

msr.default.member.skip.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to skip `member` definition.

msr.cs.member.skip.definition.description: Regex pattern to skip C# `member` definition. Overwrite default to avoid cases like: member = new xxx().

msr.default.constant.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to search constants definition.

msr.default.method.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to search method definition.

msr.default.enum.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to search `enum` definition.

msr.java.isFindClass.description: Default Regex pattern to check if what-to-find is a Java `class`.

msr.java.class.definition.description: Java/Scala Regex pattern to search class definitions.

msr.java.method.definition.description: Java/Scala Regex pattern to search method definitions.

msr.java.member.definition.description: Java/Scala Regex pattern to search member definitions.

msr.cs.codeAndConfigDocs.description: Regex pattern for C# code + configuration + document files.

msr.cs.isFindClass.description: Regex pattern to check if what-to-find is a C# `class`.

msr.cs.class.definition.description: Regex pattern to search C# class definitions.

msr.cs.method.definition.description: Regex pattern to search C# method definitions.

msr.cs.enum.definition.description: Regex pattern to search C# enum definitions.

msr.cs.member.definition.description: Regex pattern to search C# field or property definitions.

msr.cpp.codeAndConfigDocs.description: Regex pattern for C++ or C code + configuration + document files.

msr.cpp.isFindClass.description: Regex pattern to check if what-to-find is a C++ `class`.

msr.cpp.constant.definition.description: Regex pattern to search C++/C constants definition.

msr.cpp.isFindEnum.description: Default Regex to check if what-to-find is a C++ `enum`.

msr.cpp.class.definition.description: Regex pattern to search C++ or C `class` definition.

msr.cpp.method.definition.description: Regex pattern to search C++ or C `method` definition.

msr.cpp.enum.definition.description: Regex pattern to search C++ or C `enum` definition.

msr.cpp.member.definition.description: Regex pattern to search C++ or C `member` definition.

msr.cpp.member.skip.definition.description: Regex pattern to skip C++ or C struct or class `member` definition.

msr.cpp.skip.definition.description: Regex pattern to filter C++ or C non-definitions.

msr.py.codeAndConfigDocs.description: Regex pattern for Python code + configuration + document files.

msr.py.isFindClass.description: Regex pattern for Python to check if what-to-find is a `class`.

msr.py.class.definition.description: Regex pattern to search Python `class` definition.

msr.py.method.definition.description: Regex pattern to search Python `method` definition.

msr.py.enum.definition.description: Regex pattern to search Python `enum` definition.

msr.py.member.definition.description: Regex pattern to search Python `member` definition.

msr.java.codeAndConfigDocs.description: Regex pattern for Java code + configuration + document files.

msr.ui.codeAndConfigDocs.description: Regex pattern for Front-end code + configuration + document files.

msr.ui.definition.description: Default Regex pattern to find UI definitions of a word (class, method, etc.). Must use `%1` to be replaced by word to search.

msr.ui.class.skip.definition.description: Regex pattern to filter non-definitions for UI code.

msr.ui.class.definition.description: Regex pattern to search UI `class` definition.

msr.ui.member.definition.description: Regex pattern to search UI `member` definition.

msr.ui.method.definition.description: Regex pattern to search UI `method` definition.

msr.ui.method.skip.definition.description: Regex pattern to filter non-definitions of UI code.

msr.ps.definition.description: Regex pattern to search PowerShell definitions of a function or parameter.

msr.sh.definition.description: Regex pattern to search bash/sh file definitions of a function or parameter.

msr.batch.definition.description: Regex pattern to search batch file definitions of a function or variable.

msr.batch.isMethodResult.description: Regex pattern to check if a result is a method.

msr.fileExtensionMap.cpp.default: c++ cpp cxx cc c hpp h hxx

msr.fileExtensionMap.sh.default: sh bash ksh zsh csh tsh

msr.fileExtensionMap.bp.description: Protocol file extensions like Bond + Protocol Buffers + Thrift.

msr.fileExtensionMap.proj.description: Project file extension like C# / C++ in Visual Studio.

msr.fileExtensionMap.docx.default: pptx? docx? ppsx? vsdx? rtf uml

msr.go.method.definition.description: Regex pattern to search Golang method definition.

msr.go.class.definition.description: Regex pattern to search Golang class definition.

msr.go.constant.definition.description: Regex pattern to search GoLang constants definition.

msr.go.member.definition.description: Regex pattern to search GoLang member definition.

msr.go.isFindConstant.description: Regex pattern to check if `current word` is a GoLang constant.

msr.go.skipFolders.description: Regex pattern to skip folders for GoLang. You can set each project's additional skip patterns: `msr.{root-folder-name}.definition.skipFolders` or `msr.{root-folder-name}.reference.skipFolders` in your personal settings file like `%APPDATA%\Code\User\settings.json` on Windows (See doc: https://github.com/qualiu/vscode-msr/blob/master/README.md#specific-extra-search-paths-settings).

msr.refreshTmpGitFileListDuration.description: Time duration to refresh tmp-git-list-file (only refresh when running gfind-xxx commands). Value like: 1day, 3hours, 5minutes, 7seconds. It's not useful for most projects - it's very fast (less than 1s) to run git command `git ls-files`. Here just a config to avoid frequent writing tmp file.

msr.autoUpdateSearchTool.description: Auto update search tool when weekly checking and found new version.

msr.default.autoDisableFindDefinitionPat.description: Set non-empty Regex to auto disable finding definition if found language extension running, like: 'vscode\S*extension\S*java' (You can temporarily toggle enable/disable - check MSR-Def-Ref in OUTPUT tab).

msr.cs.autoDisableFindDefinitionPattern.description: Set non-empty Regex to auto disable finding C# definition if found language extension running, like: 'vscode\S*extension\S*java' (You can temporarily toggle enable/disable - check MSR-Def-Ref in OUTPUT tab).

msr.checkLanguageProcessIntervalMinutes.description: Interval (minutes) to check language process (only check when finding definition).

msr.cs.languageProcessName.description: C# language process name, to fast check and disable finding definition.

msr.java.languageProcessName.description: Java language process name, to fast check and disable finding definition.

msr.cpp.languageProcessName.description: C++ language process name, to fast check and disable finding definition.

msr.rs.languageProcessName.description: Rust language process name, to fast check and disable finding definition.

msr.rs.autoDisableFindDefinitionPattern.description: Set non-empty Regex to auto disable finding Rust definition if found language extension running, like: 'vscode\S*extension\S*java' (You can temporarily toggle enable/disable - check MSR-Def-Ref in OUTPUT tab).
